jamaica-gleaner.com/2015/04/athletics-bo.title: ATHLETICS: Bolt to run at Golden Spike meet in May Sports...
jamaica-gleaner.com/2015/04/athletics-bo.snippet: Usain Bolt is set to compete at the Golden Spike in the Czech city of Ostrava in May. Organisers say the Jamaican great will run the 200 meters on May 26 at the meet, which is part of the IAAF World Challenge Series.
